summary: An ordinance relating to the public health and sanitation; providing for and regulating the keeping, collection and removal of garbage; authorizing and directing the Board of Public Works to prepare plans and specifications, call for bids and enter into a contract therefor for a period not exceeding five (5) years; defining offenses and providing penalties and repealing Ordinance No. 24715, 27257, 27832, and 47881; declaring an emergency.
